title: Sprint 07: API Development Principles
description: Building robust, standard-compliant APIs with secure authentication.
items: 01- REST Architecture: Resources, Representations, Clean URLs, HATEOAS basics
02- HTTP Status Codes: Semantics of 200, 201, 204, 400, 401, 403, 422, 500 family
03- API Resources: Transformation layers, JsonResource, resource collections, conditional data
04- API Versioning: URL versioning vs Header versioning strategies, deprecation
05- API Authentication: Sanctum (Stateful vs Tokens), Abilities, SPA auth flow
06- JWT Implementation: Understanding tokens, claims, signing, headers structure
07- OAuth2 Basics: Passport, Client Credentials Grant (M2M), Password Grant flows
08- Rate Limiting Strategy: Throttle middleware, dynamic limits per user/plan
09- Handling Errors: Consistent JSON error envelopes, Exception rendering for APIs
10- Pagination: Cursor pagination vs LengthAware vs Simple, meta data
11- OpenAPI/Swagger: Spec definition, L5-Swagger or Scribe generation tools
12- Postman Workflows: Collections, Environments, Automated tests, Sharing
13- API Security: CORS configuration, CSP headers for APIs, Host header validation
14- Content Negotiation: Accept headers, returning generic error formats based on request
15- Third Party Integrations: Http Client (Guzzle wrapper), retrying, faking requests
